title: il2cpp-tool (private)
description: Full Il2Cpp Debugging tool with features: Invoke, Hook, Patch, Trace, Backtrace. Methods + fields from compiled il2cpp game.

title: Aide-Imgui
description: A runtime ImGui debugging and manipulation interface for native games and apps. To Be Compiled in AIDE.

title: Android-Mod-Inject
description: A root-level mod menu injector for Android games, based on LGL Mod Menu 2.9. Features a client-server architecture enabling dynamic memory manipulation, function hooking, and runtime patching for both rooted and virtual environments.

title: OffsetTester
description: A tool designed to test and validate memory offsets across various games. Supports dynamic analysis and helps in reverse engineering workflows by simplifying offset discovery and verification.

title: DumpSDK
description: A Python-based tool that converts Il2Cpp dump.cs files into usable C++ SDK headers. Designed for reverse engineering workflows, it automates struct generation and function pointer mapping, streamlining modding and analysis of Unity-based games.

title: InjectARM64
description: InjectARM64 is a virtual-space-based, non-root cheat injection tool for ARM-64 and ARM-32 Android devices. It enables safe and effective cheat deployment without requiring root access, supporting Android versions 8 through 14.
